#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

This page describes what committers must know.

= Details =

  * DataIterator will become un-exposed from SomethingService(in.partake.service.`*`).
    * Because it is difficult to keep transactions.
    * When an operation requires DataIterator, it should be closed in SomethingService.

  * Connection will become un-exposed from SomethingService.
    * Because it will take 2+ connections per thread, and bring dead-lock.
    * When an operation requires creating Connection, it should be closed in SomethingService.
